io.github.dddplus.model

接口 IMergeAwareDirtyHint<ID extends Serializable>

  • 类型参数:
    ID - 该hint的唯一标识
    所有超级接口:
    IdentifiableDomainObject<ID>, IDirtyHint

    public interface IMergeAwareDirtyHint<ID extends Serializable>
extends IDirtyHint, IdentifiableDomainObject<ID>
    可以合并的脏数据提示.

    Example:

     

 public class OrderDirtyHint implements IMergeAwareDirtyHint<Long> {
     private static int BITS = 8;
     public enum Type {
         Type1(0),
         Type2(1),
         Type3(2);
         int bit;

         BitSet dirtyMap() {
             BitSet s = new BitSet(BITS);
             s.set(bit);
             return s;
         }
     }

     private final BitSet dirtyMap = new BitSet(BITS);
     private final Order order;
     private BigDecimal price;

     public OrderDirtyHint(Order order, Type type) {
         this.order = order;
         this.dirtyMap.set(type.bit);
     }

     public boolean has(Type type) {
         return dirtyMap.intersects(type.dirtyMap());
     }

     public void onMerge(IDirtyHint thatHint) {
         OrderDirtyHint that = (OrderDirtyHint) thatHint;
         that.dirtyMap.or(dirtyMap);
         if (price != null) {
             that.price = price;
         }
     }

     public Long getId() {
         return order.getId();
     }
 }

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onMerge(IDirtyHint thatHint)
      Merge预留的hook.

      • 从接口继承的方法 io.github.dddplus.model.IdentifiableDomainObject

        getId

    • 方法详细资料

      • onMerge

        default void onMerge(IDirtyHint thatHint)
        Merge预留的hook.

        注意：合并过程中要改变状态，要改变thatHint入参的状态，而不是改变this

        参数:
        thatHint - DirtyMemento里现存的该hint
